name: Branch Wise Sketch Order Form
query:
select so.branch AS Branch,
br.branch_name AS 'Branch Name',
count(so.name) AS 'Total Orders',
SUM(CASE WHEN so.docstatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS submitted_orders, 
SUM(CASE WHEN so.docstatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pending_orders,
SUM(CASE WHEN so.docstatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelled_orders
from `tabSketch Order Form` so
left join `tabBranch` br on so.branch = br.name
where ( %(from_date)s IS NULL OR %(to_date)s IS NULL OR (Date(so.creation) BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s) )
group by so.branch
